item.title: PETROGRESS INC 10-K
item.description: PETROGRESS INC, which is in the Deep Sea Foreign Transportation Of Freight [4412] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 21, 2021 had 19871 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 266 instances financial - 179 instances 2020 - 172 instances 31 - 148 instances december - 145 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
